Name:
* Kleber da Silva Ramos BRA disqualified for an anti-doping rule violation according to press release published by the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) on August 18 2016. 




Men's Road race - Cycling - Rio 2016 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     The individual road race competition was held on public roads and the competition was a mass start event where all riders started together at the same time. The first athlete to pass the finishing line was the Gold medal winner. Event facts: Men's Road race competition was held at the Rio Olympic Velodrome and 144 athletes participated in the event.

Name:
